Service Details: - Develops and encourages Canadian talent in the performance and knowledge of classical music- At every level in the festival movement, young artists learn from each other as well as from formal adjudications by internationally respected adjudicators- Competitive music festivals provide an excellent public performance opportunity for students, and as students progress to higher levels of competition they find festivals an incentive to continue the pursuit of excellence
Print Material: Online Newsletter, Piu Mosso Newsletter, Printed Program, National Music Festival
